presentation.intro: I'm a senior architect with several years of experience in delivering
presentation.highlight: large residential projects in BIM environments using Revit.
presentation.description: Experienced in all design phases and with a strong ability to plan and manage multiple assignments simultaneously.

categories.details: Internship where I developed a web application to automate book purchases based on course data. Designed a database with large data volumes and created functions to enhance user experience. The goal was to save time for the staff.

Intensive training in web development. Frontend development with JavaScript (ES6) and React. HTML5 and CSS3. Responsive web design and accessibility APIs, as well as HTTPS requests. Backend programming with Node.js and Express. Data storage using MongoDB database and Mongoose. Industry-standard tools for version control, deployment, etc. Methods for teamwork development and remote work.

categories.place: UPC ETSAV (Technical College of Architecture in Vallés, Catalonia)

categories.details: Further developed my knowledge in housing, especially during the construction documents. Oriented in both model manager role and responsible architect. In BIM environments using Revit.
Worked in different design stages from an early stage until construction deed. Most projects were based on drawings from 3D laser scanning and Revit modeling.
Worked mainly in early stages of the projects with a focus on housing, from private villas to apartment buildings and new blocks. Learned swedish ​​among other things.
Intership. Early stage design, drawings, modeling and visualizations.

projects.name: Hasselnöten
projects.description: 7 months work. 12.380m², 73 rental apartments + 52 for sale.

projects.name: Finnberget
projects.description: 27.000m². Approx. 300 units. Competition in Finnberget

projects.name: Rördrömmen
projects.description: 20.000m². Approx. 200 apartment units. Exploitation sketches.

projects.name: Smörlottsgatan
projects.description: 12.270m². 191 apartments. Sketch for a new layout and building permit.

projects.name: Korsängen
projects.description: Production and delivery of construction deeds for the execution of 3 residential buildings + 2 commercial premises. 122 rental units. 3 month work, project I did complete alone with the client.

projects.name: Väsjön
projects.description: 206 new housing cooperatie apartments Composed of two city blocks of 3 floors + attic. With collective garden and shared underground garage in Väsjön.

projects.name: Åhusen
projects.description: From project brief, system planning document and building plan. 14.230m², 194 rental apartments. Planning and design of three new residential buildings.

projects.name: Täby Park
projects.description: Project of 12.000 m², 145 apartments + garage + 4 locals. Sketch, project brief, system documentation and building permits & plans + sales material for construction of an apartment building.

projects.name: Lappis, Student Housing
projects.description: Competition project of about 800 student apartment, 28.000 m². The final project was 4 residential towers with 145 student apartments. From sketch, project brief, project plan documentation + building permits & plans.

projects.name: Lingontuvan
projects.description: Extent 7200m², 95 new housing cooperative apartment units. Planning and design of new residential building. From the first sketches to the construction deeds

projects.name: Norra Stationsgatan
projects.description: Project where the customer, a housing association wanted to study the economic benefits of extending the building high of it's block. In order to get more apartments.

projects.name: Competition Östra Sala backe
projects.description: Land allocation competition.

projects.name: Competition Midsommarkransen
projects.description: Land allocation competition.

projects.name: Competition Tyresö
projects.description: Land allocation competition.

projects.name: Västra Blombacka
projects.description: Reform of 316 rental apartments.

projects.name: Kv. Klockarbacken
projects.description: 139 cooperative apartments, designed in two towers with shared first 3 floor plans. With a terrasse, 5 locals and underground garage.

projects.name: Kv Medlemmen
projects.description: New residential appartment block with underground garage, a kindergarder and street premises.

projects.name: Kv Segelflyget
projects.description: New residential appartment block with underground garage and street premises in the new city district of Barkarby.

projects.name: La Sala
projects.description: This is a construction appendix that I developed together with another colleague in collaboration with an architectural office from Figueras (www.grarq.com/ca). The hall is now built and it is fully functional. The project is representative for me because in this village I have spent most of my vacation days during my childhood.

projects.name: Joan Güell
projects.description: This was a renovation project I did for a private client that was planing to renovate an apartment.

projects.name: Biblioteca Barcelona
projects.description: This was one of the last projects I worked on at Archi21 Architects in Barcelona. It was a small architect's office in a very nice square (Pl. Sant Vicens de Sarrià). As it had been 4 years since the financial crisis in Catalonia there were still many architect's offices without upcoming jobs, in this competition more than 400 propasals were presented.

projects.name: Comprensive Design II
projects.description: I'm showing this design presentation because I had been on Erasmus in Budapest for a year. And I think it was a fun period of my career.
